comments:

Tom, should we be alarmed by this?

Frederic, what editors did you have open at the time?  were you able to 
function after that?

Yes, I was able to use my workspace after this exception.

I have several windows opened in my workspace and several editors opened in each
of them.
Here's an approximative list:

    1) buildnotes_core.html,
    2) org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests.model.SearchParticipantTests.java

HTH

Should not be too concerned (we prevent the deadlock :).  This is a known 
issue on some VMs see bug 86713 for details.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 86713 ***
